body.ab: By direction of the Attorney General I transmit herewith certified copies of the papers referred to in your letter of the 15th and 16th instants.

The statement of Mr. Taft comprises a very large number of petty items and details which I do not suppose you desire, and which it would take a longer time to copy than is at the disposal of our limited clerical force. I therefore send only the total, and his certificate. If this should not be sufficient, however, I will prepare a full copy.
